alert.note: Alert for Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:07AM EST until February 01 at 11:48PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Covington...down to Riverton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Lafayette. .Lowland flooding has developed along the Wabash from a combination of precipitation, snowmelt and additional rainfall on partially frozen ground. Minor flooding could be made worse by any ice jams that develop as river ice breaks up with the warmer temperatures and moves downstream. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 01... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Terre Haute. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday, February 01. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Water begins to rise in the Izaak Walton Lake. Sheet flowing water begins in the wetland project between U.S. 40 and I-70, and during a prolonged flood event project fills about 75 percent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM EST Thursday /10:30 PM CST Thursday/ the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 19.9 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday, February 01. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement will be issued by Friday afternoon.this afternoon by around 100 PM EST /noon CST/.
